short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily affirmations from Pope Innocent III about the Misery of the Human Condition.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides the user with a daily affirmation, quoted from Pope Innocent III's writing On The Misery of the Human Condition.

Additionally, the quotes, signature, background, text color, and text position can all be customized, allowing the user to configure their own daily quotes.
